english.segment1: . [Verse 1]. You know I really love you. Your love is beautiful, lasting and true. I've searched for a true love for such a long, long time. Now, my search has ended, yes, cause you are mine.
english.segment2: [Chorus]. I'll always love you and I'll always tell you so. As long as I'm with you, my love I'll always show
english.segment3: [Verse 2]. Whenever I'm sad and feeling real blue. I begin to feel happy as I sit and think of you. I think of your face and your personality. You are so beautiful, you mean everything to me.
